sense.def:
Kadar tekočina ali plamen
spurts out of something
, pride iz nečesa hitro, v tankem, silovitem toku.

seg.quote: ...a blow that sent blood spurting from his mouth.
My arm began to spurt blood.

sense.def:
A spurt of activity or emotion
je nenadno, kratko obdobje dejavnosti ali čustev.

seg.quote: Her feelings varied from tenderness to sudden spurts of genuine love.

sense.def:
To spurt somewhere
pomeni nenadoma za kratek čas povečati svojo hitrost.

seg.quote: With Claude driving they spurted through back streets.
